name: Best Youtube Video LazyLoad
author: Monzur Alam

sections.description:
Best Youtube Video Lazyload

Youtube Video Lazyload improves Google page Speed Insights Score, Gtmetrix, and Pingdom score. Also, fix Reduce the impact of third-party Code & Some third-party resources can be lazy-loaded with a facade in page speed insights.

This time Youtube Video LazyLoad provides only a shortcode. You can use it anywhere for Youtube videos. You can pass the video id & custom thumbnail.

Features of Best Youtube Video Lazyload

  • Quick to set up
  • Set a custom preview image per video
  • Shortcode to show anywhere
  • Increase Google page speed, GTmetrix & Pingdom Tools Score.
  • Reduce the impact of third-party code
  • Reduce External requests.

Shortcode

[youtube_lazyload id=”youtube_video_id_here” thumb=”custom_thumbnail_link”]
id attr required.
thumb attr optional.
sections.installation:
1. Install Best Youtube Video Lazyload by uploading the best-youtube-video-lazyload directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate Best Youtube Video Lazyload through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Which video platforms are supported?

Videos from the Biggest video platform, Youtube (https://youtube.com) are supported.

Should I use the Lazy Load for Videos plugin?

Yes.

How to use a custom thumbnail for Videos?

You can use a custom thumbnail via thumb parameter on the shortcode.

How can I calculate my Google PageSpeed Score?

PageSpeed Insights analyzes the content of a web page, then generates suggestions to make that page faster. You can check your site speed & more information.
Google PageSpeed
